mapper.insert: INSERT INTO content_setting(content_setting_no, user_no, tasty_keyword, shopping_keyword_no, user_keyword_no, sort_section_no) VALUES( content_setting_no.nextval, #{userNo}, #{tastyKeyword:VARCHAR}, shopping_keyword_no.nextval, user_keyword_no.nextval, sort_section_no.nextval )

INSERT INTO shopping_keyword(shopping_keyword_no, shopping_search_1, shopping_search_2, shopping_search_3, shopping_review) VALUES( (SELECT shopping_keyword_no FROM content_setting WHERE user_no = #{userNo}), #{shoppingSearch1:VARCHAR}, #{shoppingSearch2:VARCHAR}, #{shoppingSearch3:VARCHAR}, #{shoppingReview:VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO user_keyword(user_keyword_no, user_search_1, user_search_2, user_search_3, user_video_1, user_video_2) VALUES( (SELECT user_keyword_no FROM content_setting WHERE user_no = #{userNo}), #{userSearch1:VARCHAR}, #{userSearch2:VARCHAR}, #{userSearch3:VARCHAR}, #{userVideo1:VARCHAR}, #{userVideo2:VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO sort_section(sort_section_no, show_boxoffice_top_10, show_romance_comedy, show_horror_thriller, show_fantasy_sf, show_action, show_animation, show_soccer, show_oversea_soccer, show_baseball, show_oversea_baseball, show_basketball, show_oversea_basketball, show_sport_general, show_sport_highlight, show_korean_food, show_japanese_food, show_chinese_food, show_foreign_food, show_dessert, show_shopping_search_1, show_shopping_search_2, show_shopping_search_3, show_shopping_review, show_user_search_1, show_user_search_2, show_user_search_3, show_user_video_1, show_user_video_2) VALUES( (SELECT sort_section_no FROM content_setting WHERE user_no = #{userNo}), #{boxOfficeTop10:NUMERIC}, #{romanceComedy:NUMERIC}, #{horrorThriller:NUMERIC}, #{fantasySF:NUMERIC}, #{action:NUMERIC}, #{animation:NUMERIC}, #{soccer:NUMERIC}, #{overseaSoccer:NUMERIC}, #{baseball:NUMERIC}, #{overseaBaseball:NUMERIC}, #{basketball:NUMERIC}, #{overseaBasketball:NUMERIC}, #{sportGeneral:NUMERIC}, #{sportHighlight:NUMERIC}, #{koreanFood:NUMERIC}, #{japaneseFood:NUMERIC}, #{chineseFood:NUMERIC}, #{foreignFood:NUMERIC}, #{dessert:NUMERIC}, #{showShoppingSearch1:NUMERIC}, #{showShoppingSearch2:NUMERIC}, #{showShoppingSearch3:NUMERIC}, #{showShoppingReview:NUMERIC}, #{showUserSearch1:NUMERIC}, #{showUserSearch2:NUMERIC}, #{showUserSearch3:NUMERIC}, #{showUserVideo1:NUMERIC}, #{showUserVideo2:NUMERIC} )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM content_setting cs, user_keyword uk, shopping_keyword sk, sort_section ss WHERE cs.shopping_keyword_no = sk.shopping_keyword_no AND cs.user_keyword_no = uk.user_keyword_no AND cs.sort_section_no = ss.sort_section_no AND cs.user_no = #{userNo}
